news.title: Humiliation for Starmer as he loses control of Commons
news.summary: The BBC's political editor Chris Mason and chief political correspondent Henry Zeffman on the welfare bill.

news.title: Trump says Israel has agreed to conditions for 60-day Gaza ceasefire
news.summary: US president warns Hamas "it will only get worse" if they do not accept the deal.

news.title: Diddy jury to keep deliberating after being deadlocked on most serious charge
news.summary: The panel has reached a verdict on four of the five counts in the rap mogul's sex trafficking trial.

news.title: US halts some weapons shipments to Ukraine, White House says
news.summary: US is concerned about low stockpiles for its own needs, as Russia intensifies the war in Ukraine.

news.title: Qantas data breach exposes up to six million customer profiles
news.summary: The airline was hit by a cyber attack on a platform storing names, email addresses and phone numbers.
